raw akas.title: Bare Feet in NYC with Mickela Mallozi

akas from release info: Bare Feet with Mickela Mallozzi (original title)
Bare Feet in NYC with Mickela Mallozi USA (third season title)

1.title: Manhattan's Chinatown

episode of.title: Bare Feet with Mickela Mallozzi (TV Series 2014– )

1.plot: Mickela kicks off her New York series in one of the oldest & most iconic neighborhoods in NYC, Manhattan's Chinatown, during the festive time of Chinese Lunar New Year!

2.title: The Balkans in the Boroughs

episode of.title: Bare Feet with Mickela Mallozzi (TV Series 2014– )

2.plot: Mickela gets a taste of The Balkans throughout three of the five boroughs: Slavic Soul Party! In Brooklyn, NY Gypsy Festival in Manhattan, and Little Serbia in Queens.

3.title: ¡Viva La Mexico!

episode of.title: Bare Feet with Mickela Mallozzi (TV Series 2014– )

3.plot: In preparation for Dia de los Muertos with the Mexican community in NYC, Mickela learns traditional folk dance and even jumps in with an all-female mariachi band.

5.title: Little Greece

episode of.title: Bare Feet with Mickela Mallozzi (TV Series 2014– )

5.plot: Mickela celebrates the annual St. Nicholas feast with the Greek-American community in Queens, while also finding local heroes who keep the Greek culture alive.

6.title: Happy Diwali

episode of.title: Bare Feet with Mickela Mallozzi (TV Series 2014– )

6.plot:

7.title: Little Ukraine

episode of.title: Bare Feet with Mickela Mallozzi (TV Series 2014– )

7.plot: Little Ukraine is a small 3-block gem in Manhattan's East Village: from celebrating Pierogi Day to jumping splits with Ukrainian dancers, Mickela gets a taste of it all!

8.title: Harlem

episode of.title: Bare Feet with Mickela Mallozzi (TV Series 2014– )

8.plot:

9.title: Brazil in NYC

episode of.title: Bare Feet with Mickela Mallozzi (TV Series 2014– )

9.plot: Brazilians are born to dance, and Mickela learns as many ways as possible how New Yorkers keep that Brazilian energy alive - with capoeira, forró, and Carnival's samba!

10.title: Little Haiti

episode of.title: Bare Feet with Mickela Mallozzi (TV Series 2014– )

10.plot: Mickela gets transported to Haiti in the streets of Flatbush, Brooklyn with drum lessons, dance classes, and local shops.

1.title: Dancing in My Italy (Minturno, Italy)

episode of.title: Bare Feet with Mickela Mallozzi (TV Series 2014– )

1.plot: Mickela returns to where it all started, the small, sleepy, Southern Italian beach town of Minturno, where her parents immigrated from over 40 years ago. She reconnects with her roots during the town's biggest celebration, the annual Sagra delle Regne (Wheat Harvest Festival).

2.title: It Takes Two to Tango (Buenos Aires, Argentina)

episode of.title: Bare Feet with Mickela Mallozzi (TV Series 2014– )

2.plot: Mickela gets up close and personal with the locals as she heads to Buenos Aires, Argentina, to learn the seductive dance of tango. From attending the world's largest tango festival to dancing on the city's main stage, Mickela sees it all!

11.title: Music City (Nashville, Tennessee - USA)

episode of.title: Bare Feet with Mickela Mallozzi (TV Series 2014– )

11.plot: Nashville, Tennessee isn't coined "Music City" for nothing - Mickela discovers the traditions of American music & dance in this vibrant southern city, from line dancing to modern ballet to old-time buck dancing.

12.title: The Lumbee Dance of the Spring Moon (Robeson County, North Carolina - USA)

episode of.title: Bare Feet with Mickela Mallozzi (TV Series 2014– )

12.plot: Mickela joins a Native-American Pow Wow with the Lumbee Tribe, digging deeper into the obstacles that a non-Federally recognized tribe must face.

13.title: Music, Dance, Art, and Offering (Bali, Indonesia)

1.title: Hogmanay in Scotland (Edinburgh, Scotland)

episode of.title: Bare Feet with Mickela Mallozzi (TV Series 2014– )

1.plot: Mickela heads to Edinburgh, Scotland to celebrate Hogmanay, the world's largest New Year's Eve celebration. While there, she explores Scotland's traditional dances of ceilidh, Highland dance, & step dance.

2.title: Malaysia Part 1 (Western Malaysia)

episode of.title: Bare Feet with Mickela Mallozzi (TV Series 2014– )

2.plot: Mickela discovers the diversity and multi-faceted cultural history in the metropolitan city of Kuala Lumpur, from its Chinese, Indian, and Malay dance influences.

3.title: Malaysia Part 2 (Eastern Malaysia)

episode of.title: Bare Feet with Mickela Mallozzi (TV Series 2014– )

3.plot: Mickela digs deeper into the Portuguese colonial influence and the indigenous tribal communities in the Eastern part of Malaysia as she celebrates Gawai, the Harvest Festival.

4.title: Montreal Then & Now (Montreal, Canada)

episode of.title: Bare Feet with Mickela Mallozzi (TV Series 2014– )

4.plot: Montreal's European history translates to its traditional dances from France, England, Scotland, and Ireland - Mickela gets a taste of this Old World feel at La Grande Rencontre Festival, while also experiencing the artistic modernity of this city. She also gets a first-hand lesson on dance for people with disabilities.

5.title: Croatia's Dalmatian Coast (Dubrovnik, Croatia)

episode of.title: Bare Feet with Mickela Mallozzi (TV Series 2014– )

5.plot: Former war-torn Croatia is one of today's top destinations. Mickela explores the dance and music traditions along the Adriatic coast in Dubrovnik's 1,000-year-old city.

6.title: Ball Season in Vienna (Vienna, Austria)

episode of.title: Bare Feet with Mickela Mallozzi (TV Series 2014– )

7.title: Jeju Fire Festival (Seoul & Jeju, South Korea)

episode of.title: Bare Feet with Mickela Mallozzi (TV Series 2014– )

7.plot: The Jeju Fire Festival in South Korea celebrates new life - with it comes all aspects of Korean tradition, beauty, and modern advancement. Mickela spans the South Korean culture from traditional mask dances to the ever-popular KPOP.

8.title: Dancer of the Year Competition (The Cook Islands)

episode of.title: Bare Feet with Mickela Mallozzi (TV Series 2014– )

10.title: Where Europe Meets Asia (Turkey)

episode of.title: Bare Feet with Mickela Mallozzi (TV Series 2014– )

10.plot: Mickela kicks off her New York series in one of the oldest & most iconic neighborhoods in NYC, Manhattan's Chinatown, during the festive time of Chinese Lunar New Year!

imdb.plot outline: Join Emmy Award-winning travel host Mickela Mallozzi on a trek around the world, exploring culture, dance and celebrations! From a magical journey in Turkey to dancing tango on the main stage in Buenos Aires, and experiencing the ethnic flavors of NYC, Mickela seeks out the traditional side of every culture while connecting with the local community through celebration and artistic expression.
imdb.title: Bare Feet with Mickela Mallozzi
plot: Join Emmy Award-winning travel host Mickela Mallozzi on a trek around the world, exploring culture, dance and celebrations! From a magical journey in Turkey to dancing tango on the main stage in Buenos Aires, and experiencing the ethnic flavors of NYC, Mickela seeks out the traditional side of every culture while connecting with the local community through celebration and artistic expression.
